title: Would anyone be interested in a 1v1 tournament on oce ?
body: Lets face we all blame our teams (some more than others) and sometimes we just wish we could have a 1v1 game type instead but riot will sadly never add one but what about a 128 man 1v1 tournament monthly maybe even weekly on oce if interested comment below

replies.body: This would be awesome! I am really keen on the whole tournament thing in general! if it really took of there could even be prizes or even broadcast the finals live on twitch or youtube or something!
Yeah well my big master plan would to have it like a monthly occurance with massive prizes up for grabs it would be great if we could get a riot employee to look at this
